pages.name: Registration
userStoryIndex: As a Customer, I want to be able to register in order to have an account.

pages.name: Login
userStoryIndex: As a Customer, I want to be able to login.
As a Merchant, I want to be able to login to the Merchant page.

pages.name: Profile
userStoryIndex: As a Customer, I want to be able to have access to my profile.
As a Merchant, I want to access to my profile.

pages.name: Logout
userStoryIndex: As a Customer, I want to logout from the profile by clicking on a button.
